ygData.subject: Re: Heyers
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Y know, besides cleric, enchanters are one of the best classes to help people... that s why I chose to be enchanter. It just seems to fit the character
ygData.messageBody:
> Heh, actually other magery class r much better than enchanters when they
> reach high lvl. I think enchanter as not as powerful as their magic
> counterparts but I dun care. I might not even last to reach lvl 20 (due to
> motion sickness), so meanwhile just RP someone I like ;)

Y'know, besides cleric, enchanters are one of the best classes to
help people... that's why I chose to be enchanter. It just seems to
fit the character profile I want to play...

The rebel High Elf who scorns normal haughty high elven society to
mingle with the "lower" races because he's seen what pride and
racism can lead to...

*heh*


--


Love is in the air...
Get me a gas mask, quick!!!

Cya,
Praetor
